thread.title: NBA roster cuts roundup: Perry Jones, Chuck Hayes released
thread.title_full: NBA roster cuts roundup: Perry Jones, Chuck Hayes released

author: SI Wire
title: NBA roster cuts roundup: Perry Jones, Chuck Hayes released
text:
NBA roster cuts roundup: Perry Jones, Chuck Hayes released Sports Illustrated 2 hrs ago SI Wire © Sports Illustrated nba roster cuts perry jones chuck hayes
With the NBA’s Oct. 26 deadline to submit opening-night rosters quickly approaching, roster cuts are taking place league-wide. They’ll come at least 24 hours prior to Oct. 26, if not earlier, to allow players to clear waivers.
AdChoices Veterans like Chuck Hayes and Samuel Dalembert have been released as teams try to trim their rosters to 15 or below.
Every player acquired by the Nuggets in exchange for Rockets guard Ty Lawson has now been cut. Meanwhile, younger players like Cory Jefferson and Erick Green have secured some of the final spots at the end of teams’ benches.
At least 120 players, roughly 21.1% of the league, will be cut before October is over.
The names below have been reported or confirmed cuts. The teams are listed alphabetically.
